com.trogdadr2tr.socket

Interface ServerListener

  • All Superinterfaces:
    java.util.EventListener

    public interface ServerListener
extends java.util.EventListener
    Interface to listen to the ServerReciever.
    Author:
    Colt Rogness

    • Method Detail

      • requestLogin

        void requestLogin()
        Called when the server requests a user login.

      • updateConnectionState

        void updateConnectionState(ConnectionState state)
        Called when the server changes the state of the connection. Can be triggered by joining or leaving a game, starting or leaving a game, logging in, etc.

      • serverErrorMessage

        void serverErrorMessage(java.lang.String errorMessage)
        Called when the server receives an invalid login, and requests another.
        Parameters:
        errorMessage - error message sent by the server.

      • downloadGameRooms

        void downloadGameRooms(java.util.ArrayList<GameRoom> gameRooms)
        Called when the server sends an ArrayList of the GameRooms available to be joined.
        Parameters:
        gameRooms - current open rooms on the server

      • downloadGameRoom

        void downloadGameRoom(GameRoom gameRoom)
        Called when server sends an updated game room to the player.
        Parameters:
        gameRoom - updated game room

      • newMessage

        void newMessage(Message message)
        Called when a new message is sent to the player.
        Parameters:
        message - the new message.

      • downloadMap

        void downloadMap(GameMap map)
        Called when the server sends the starting game map.
        Parameters:
        map - the map of the game

      • updateUnit

        void updateUnit(com.trogdadr2tr.resources.Unit unit)
        Called when the server sends unit updates.
        Parameters:
        u - the updated unit
        index - the index of the old unit in the unit ArrayList

      • updateBuilding

        void updateBuilding(com.trogdadr2tr.resources.Building building)
        Called when the server sends building updates.
        Parameters:
        b - the updated building
        index - the index of the building in the building ArrayList

      • addUnit

        void addUnit(com.trogdadr2tr.resources.Unit unit)
        Called when the server sends out a new unit.
        Parameters:
        u - the new unit

        void addBuilding(com.trogdadr2tr.resources.Building building)
        Called when the server sends out a new building.
        Parameters:

      • removeUnit

        void removeUnit(com.trogdadr2tr.resources.Unit unit)
        Called when the server removes and old unit.
        Parameters:
        u - the unit to be removed

      • removeBuilding

        void removeBuilding(com.trogdadr2tr.resources.Building building)
        Called when the server removes and old building.
        Parameters:
        b - the building to be removed

      • updateResources

        void updateResources(int gold,
                     int wood,
                     int food,
                     int stone)
        Called when the server updates the RTS player's resources.
        Parameters:
        gold - total gold
        wood - total wood
        food - total food
        stone - total stone
